column2: I only shared a few bites of the waffle. That way I could justify ordering dessert. The pork and toffee sundae sounded like nothing I'd ever had before
column3: so I had to try it. And
column5: it was perhaps the least stand out of the dishes we tried. Not that it was BAD
column6: oh no. It's just that it tasted largely like a toffee milkshake. The pork flavoring was subtle enough that it largely got lost amidst the other flavors.
